org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class TargetGroup

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.AbstractIdentityObject
      org.webcurator.domain.model.core.AbstractTarget
          org.webcurator.domain.model.core.TargetGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
InTrayResource, UserInTrayResource, Annotatable, HasDatabaseIdentity, HasIdentity, HasOid, Overrideable, UserOwnable
public class TargetGroup
extends AbstractTarget

A TargetGroup contains a number of child targets or target groups.

getOwnershipMetaData

public java.lang.String getOwnershipMetaData()
Get the ownership Meta Data for the TargetGroup. This allows additional information about ownership to be added to the group, which is important since a group can only have a single owner.

Returns:
Returns the ownerhsipMetaData.
